title: Alois Petřina
text: Alois Petřina (1923 – 1998, Prague) was a Czechoslovak <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed for <a href="Czechoslovakia%20at%20the%20Olympics">Czechoslovakia</a> in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201948%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1948%20Summer%20Olympics">1948 Summer Olympics</a>.
